TimedHelp_Interval.label: Interval for timed help (in seconds)
TimedHelp_Interval.tooltip: The bot will send a help message for a random command each x seconds

TimedHelp_Message.value: $help (!commands for a list of all commands)
TimedHelp_Message.label: Timed help text (available tags: $help)
TimedHelp_Message.tooltip: The text that is shown for tiemd helps
